summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the Plat of Ridgewood, an addition to the City of Seattle, executed on the 7th day of May, 1910, by the Sunshine Realty Co, M. G. Hall, Vice President and H. E. Dunham, Secretary as mortgagee and the Title Trust Company, by L. W. Lewis, Vice President and W. S. Howard, Assistant Secretary, as owners in feel simple; on the 11th day of June 1910, by Edwin Beekman, as mortgage and on the 25th day of June, 1910, by Sarah E. Abt, Nellie Hasbrouck, and William B. Shoemaker, Alice C. Shoemaker, as owners in fee simple and P. A. Heney, as mortgagee.
